r2 - 0 imm, 1 reg
n2 - 0>1 turns add into sub

0110011,b000,0x00,ADD
0110011,b000,0x20,SUB
0110011,b100,0x00,OR
0110011,b110,0x00,AND
0110011,b111,0x00,XOR

0110011,b001,0x00,SLL
0110011,b101,0x20,SRL
0110011,b101,0x00,SRA
0110011,b010,0x00,SLT
0110011,b011,0x00,SLTU

0010011,b000,ADDI
0010011,b100,XORI
0010011,b110,ORI
0010011,b111,ANDI
0010011,b001,0x00,SLLI
0010011,b101,0x00,SRLI
0010011,b101,0x20,SRAI
0010011,b010,SLTI
0010011,b011,SLTIU
